thoughts.text: The execute_python_file command failed because the scrape_website.py file was not found. I will use the execute_shell command to download the file from GitHub.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the execute_shell command to download the scrape_website.py file from GitHub will allow me to use the execute_python_file command to create the output file. This will help me ensure that I am adequately prepared for my adventure.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to download the scrape_website.py file from GitHub
- Use the execute_python_file command to execute the scrape_website.py file and create the output file
- Use the read_file command to read the output of the scrape_website.py file and get the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail
- Use this information to prepare for my adventure
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am adequately prepared for the trip and not take unnecessary risks.
